word:
The theories held by Ellet Waggoner were similar in character to those we had met and rebuked in several places where we met fanatical movements after the passing of the time in 1844. Dr. Waggoner was then departing from the faith in the doctrine he held regarding spiritual affinities.--Letter 224, 1908, p. 1. (To W. W. Prescott, June 24, 1908.) 

White Estate Washington, D. C. May 20, 1982
